site.description: Eclipse update site for the Community Z Tools (CZT) Eclipse plugin. The CZT Eclipse plugin provides an IDE environment for editing Z specifications, in LaTeX or Unicode markup. It provides syntax colouring, continuous background parsing and typechecking, template insertion, outline support and many other features.
